metadata.name: #0001 - GALAXY
metadata.description:
BLOOM is a collection of 1:1s based on individual words as they were originally presented in the SEEDS design by PHRAZE. 

SEEDS is a single design that contains all 2,048 potential seed phrase words used to secure crypto wallets. In December 2022 it was released as 24 hour open edition. 809 SEEDS NFTs were minted at that time, setting the collection size. 

For every 25 SEEDS that were minted, PHRAZE offered to airdrop a 1:1 to a random token holder. This means (at least) 34 BLOOM 1:1 designs will be released. Designs will initially be released and airdropped to SEEDS holders weekly. 

GALAXY is the very first  1:1 design released in this collection.
